sentences.sContent: Now, two macaque monkeys may have helped MIT researchers solve the time tracking puzzle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now, two macaque monkeys may have helped MIT researchers solve the time tracking puzzle.
sentences.sCn: 现在，两只短尾猿或许可以帮助这些研究人员们解开时间谜团。

trans.tranOther: any of various Old World monkeys of the genus Macaca, inhabiting wooded or rocky regions of Asia and Africa
